AUTHOR: Twentysix
SHORT: Allows cross server communication through Red
DESCRIPTION: Communicate with other servers through Red! Works in DMs too.
NAME: Rift
INSTALL_MSG:
`[p]riftopen` to use it. Remember to type only the channel name. Have fun!
This command is usable by everyone. If you want to restrict it to certain users you might want to download the 'permissions' cog.
